"Licensed, Sept. 7. 1686. Rob. Midgley" --P. [3]. Page 169 misnumbered as 168. Includes advertisement: p. [1]-[4] at end. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
